data.title: Christ Cathedral
data.text:
Statement Regarding ‘Last Supper’ Paris Olympics Opening Ceremony from the Bishops of Orange

CAMPUS HOURS: Daily: 6 a.m. – 10 p.m. (Cathedral closes at 9 p.m.)

PARISH OFFICE HOURS: Monday to Thursday: 9 a.m. – 5 p.m. | Friday: 9:30 a.m. – 5 p.m. | Saturday and Sunday: 8:30 a.m. – 3 p.m.

TOUR INFORMATION: Cathedral Tour, Monday – Thursday, 1 p.m. and 2 p.m. | Campus Tour, Friday, 10 a.m. and 1 p.m.

GIFT SHOP HOURS: Monday to Thursday: 10 a.m. – 5 p.m. | Friday: 10 a.m. – 7 p.m. | Saturday and Sunday: 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.

Dear Brothers and Sisters in Christ,

Thank you for visiting the Christ Cathedral website. If you’re visiting this site to learn more about Christ Cathedral campus, or how you can become a part of our parish community, you are in the right place.

The Christ Cathedral website increases awareness of the many services and functions Christ Cathedral and its campus make available to parishioners and the public, everything from events to enjoy and celebrate to opportunities to help and serve others.

In addition to the site’s focus on Christ Cathedral, its many public amenities, and its future as the hub of Catholic worship in Orange County, the website pays tribute to the cathedral’s extensive history, from its construction in 1980 when it was known as Crystal Cathedral, to its comprehensive renovation and dedication in 2019 as Christ Cathedral.
